title: Resize Toolbar area
content: Is there any way to increase the height (or width depending on how you look at it) of the tool bar/header? I'm referring to the gray area. I'd like to be able to read the wording on the theme. I've tried decreasing (lowering) the mailbox area and can't find a way to that either. I've taken a screenshot to hopefully show what I'm asking about.
creator: ktsmom

title: Email sending not working
content:
Since last night my emails in 3 accounts won't send in thunderbird. I get the following message

the message could note be sent because connecting to the outgoing server SMTP mail.optusnet.com.au failed. The server maybe unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your outgoing server (SMTP) is correct and try again.

The provider Optus has confirmed it doesn't have any issues.

Is there a problem with this with Windows 11 which i have just downloaded 5 days ago?

Does anyone have any suggestions?
creator: ajs1101

title: Passwords

creator: info9784

title: Alphabetised list of subfolders gone wrong!
content:
Hi all - I'm running Thunderbird (14.05) on a desktop Mac running Sequoia 15.7.2

In my Local Folders, I have sub folders which in turn have a large number of subfolders. All of those sub folders are automatically listed alphabetically as they're created. In the last couple days, a fairly random selection of six folders from topline folders, sub folders and subsub folders have been shifted to the end of the alphabetized list and I have absolutely no idea why. I can manually move them back no problem, but I'd really like to stop it happening again! Also, I've tried clicking on the topline folder and choosing to sort by subject, but it changes nothing. Even renaming an mis-listed folder to a new name does not make it move to its correct place in the alphabet. Any ideas? Thanks
creator: adele7

title: ricezione pec solo all'apertura del programa
content:
buongiorno ho diverse mail che funzionano bene mentre la mia PEC scarica la posta in arrivo solo all'apertura del programma e non le aggiorna più. nelle impostazioni ho messo di controllare ogni 6 mini nuovi messaggi ma non funziona devo chiudere e riaprire Thunderbird. Il server di posta è Imap
